subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Ilya Kovalchuk scored twice as the Devils beat the Ottawa Senators, and the Penguins’ Evgeni Malkin locked up his second N.H.L. scoring title in a win over the Flyers.
snippet: Ilya Kovalchuk scored twice as the Devils beat the Ottawa Senators, and the Penguins’ Evgeni Malkin locked up his second N.H.L. scoring title in a win over the Flyers.
